abstract: The cable media mogul John C. Malone told a judge on Monday that he held no ill will toward his longtime business partner, Barry Diller, who controls IAC/InterActiveCorp, even though the two are now battling over who controls what at IAC.
lead_paragraph: The cable media mogul John C. Malone told a judge on Monday that he held no ill will toward his longtime business partner, Barry Diller, who controls IAC/InterActiveCorp, even though the two are now battling over who controls what at IAC.

headline.main: Malone Speaks of Diller as Court Battle Starts
